00043 //=============================================================================
00044 //
00045 //  Helper Functions for binary reading / writing
00046 //
00047 //=============================================================================
00048 
00049 #ifndef OPENMESH_SR_TYPES_HH
00050 #define OPENMESH_SR_TYPES_HH
00051 
00052 
00053 //== INCLUDES =================================================================
00054 
00055 #include <OpenMesh/Core/System/config.h>
00056 
00057 
00058 //== NAMESPACES ===============================================================
00059 
00060 namespace OpenMesh {
00061 namespace IO {
00062 
00063 
00064 //=============================================================================
00065 
00066 
00071 
00072 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 
00074 typedef unsigned char    uchar;
00075 typedef unsigned short   ushort;
00076 typedef unsigned long    ulong;
00077 
00078 typedef char           int8_t;  typedef unsigned char      uint8_t;
00079 typedef short          int16_t; typedef unsigned short     uint16_t;
00080 
00081 // Int should be 32 bit on all archs.
00082 // long is 32 under windows but 64 under unix 64 bit
00083 typedef int            int32_t; typedef unsigned int       uint32_t;
00084 #if defined(OM_CC_MSVC)
00085 typedef __int64        int64_t; typedef unsigned __int64   uint64_t;
00086 #else
00087 typedef long long      int64_t; typedef unsigned long long uint64_t;
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 typedef float          float32_t;
00091 typedef double         float64_t;
00092 
00093 typedef uint8_t        rgb_t[3];
00094 typedef uint8_t        rgba_t[4];
00095 
00097 
00098 
00099 //=============================================================================
00100 } // namespace IO
00101 } // namespace OpenMesh
00102 //=============================================================================
00103 #endif // OPENMESH_MESHREADER_HH defined
00104 //=============================================================================
